about_the_game:
A soundtrack with Instrumental music specially created for the games in the Jigsaw Puzzle Tales series, released by Mens Sana Interactive.

Now you can enjoy the themes created by the talented musicians Tatyana Jacques and Arthur Cordeiro on your computer at any time.

Perfect for studying, working or just relaxing. Each track can be seamlessly looped. Listen to it directly from your Steam client.

Includes six tracks from these games:

  • Alice in Wonderland - a jigsaw puzzle / Themes A and B from Tatyana Jacques
  • How Buddy's parents meant - a jigsaw puzzle tale / Theme from Arthur Cordeiro
  • Lucky and a life worth living - a jigsaw puzzle tale / Theme from Arthur Cordeiro
  • Magic Lessons in Wand Valley - a jigsaw puzzle tale / Theme from Arthur Cordeiro
  • My Little Prince - a jigsaw puzzle tale / Theme from Tatyana Jacques

The soundtrack can be purchased independently from the games, and will also be offered in a special bundle with all the games in the Jigsaw Puzzle Tales series.

You can play the soundtrack directly on your Steam Client. Search for soundtracks in your Library, as in the image below:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 75 MB available space

short_description: Relaxing music from the games in the Jigsaw Puzzle Tales series. Now you can enjoy these praised themes on your computer at any time.
